5c064c400db834001d234f68 Description: Universal mount for AK dust cover, manufactured by Tactica Tula company. Designed for installation of optical scopes, collimator sights, laser designators and other devices and accessories on AK systems family and semiautomatic smoothbore Saiga carbines.
5d2c33Cc48f0355d95672c25 Name: AK TWS Dog Leg Beryl-style Rail
5d2c33Cc48f0355d95672c25 Description: The Texas Weapon Systems Dog Leg Beryl-style Rail with an integrated Picatinny rail is compatible with all models of Kalashnikov automatic rifles and carbines based on the AK platform.
5d2c770c48f03543Da07c100 Description: 4th generation Optic Mount Rail Base(POPC, Podstawa Optycznych Przyrzadow Celowniczych) of Polish Beryl weapon system with an integrated Picatinny rail, which can be installed on the new AKM to AR stock adapter.
5649b2314bd2Fd79388b4576 Name: POPC AKM to AR Stock adapter
5649b2314bd2Fd79388b4576 Description: A specific AKM to AR adapter for POPC.
566Cb2314bdc2d79388b4576 Name: POPC AK100 to AR Stock adapter
566Cb2314bdc2d79388b4576 Description: A specific AK100 to AR adapter for POPC.
628b9be6cff66b70c662b14c Description: A standard-issue dust cover for AK rifles, manufactured by Sureshot Armament Group.
628a83c29179c324ed2695AB Description: The Sureshot Armament Group Mk.3 handguard for RD-704, equipped with an M-LOK interface for the installation of additional devices and accessories and a picatinny rail on top for sights and tactical equipment mounting.
628a83c29179c324ed26955A Description: The Sureshot Armament Group Mk.3 handguard for AK, equipped with an M-LOK interface for the installation of additional devices and accessories and a picatinny rail on top for sights and tactical equipment mounting.
628a83c29179c324ed64955A Description: The Sureshot Armament Group Mk.2.1 standard handguard for AK series, equipped with an M-LOK interface for the installation of additional devices and accessories and a picatinny rail on top for sights and tactical equipment mounting.
628a83c29179c324ed64943D Description: The Sureshot Armament Group Mk.2 for AK series, equipped with an M-LOK interface for the installation of additional devices and accessories and a picatinny rail on top for sights and tactical equipment mounting.
5fbcc437d724d907e20BCd5c Description: A thin and lightweight stock manufactured by SIG Sauer.
57ffa9f424597772857Ee844 Description: The integrally machined B-11 foregrip is manufactured from aluminum alloy D16T with black coating and can be installed instead of the standard-issue foregrip on the AKS-74U. The foregrip is fitted with Picatinny rail mounts on three sides, allowing for the installation of additional equipment such as tactical foregrips, flashlights, and laser designators. Manufactured by Zenit.
